numbered_ace_sentences: 1. In this graph, I noticed a trend.
2. More men text their parents than visit their parents in person.
3. More women text their parents than visit their parents in person.
4. More men text their parents than call their parents.
5. More women text their parents than call their parents.
6. I wonder why people do not call their parents more than they text their parents.
7. This trend relates to my community.
8. Almost everyone in my community can communicate with their parents every day.
10. A person communicates with ears or eyes or a mouth.
